title.rendered: FREE Email Marketing Course for Beginners

content.rendered:
Hello Readers! We feel very delighted to share that in the month of August, we have shared Free Email Marketing Course For Beginners who want to learn email marketing from the basic. The course contains chapter wise modules stating what is email marketing, how you can grow your mailing list, what are the practices to generate leads from email marketing campaigns, how to perform A/B email testing and more…. This course is the synopsis of the basic of email marketing that you can learn absolutely free. Those who are already well aware of email marketing tactics can even learn the Advanced Level of Email Marketing from us under the supervision of well-experienced trainers. This course will not only help freshers or newcomers to understand the process of email marketing; it will also nurture marketers as well as businessmen’s knowledge to create a successful email marketing strategy for their business.   If you are reading about our email marketing course for the first time, then don’t feel disheartened. You can catch up on our chapters in this post. Have a look at 12 chapters of email marketing course for beginners just for you!

1- How to get started with email marketing?

Email Marketing is the most effective and one of the best ways of connecting with your leads, nurturing them, and turning them into your valuable customers. In the first chapter, we have shared the basic overview of Email Marketing. Have a look! Chapter 1

2 – How to create the email marketing list from scratch?

In this chapter, we have discussed what is a mailing list? What is the significance of the mailing list in online business? What are the best practices to create the mailing list and segment them for business purposes? Have a look! Chapter 2

3 – How to create a free email template without coding?

Email marketing is a powerful tool for growing your business. However, writing a simple text mail won’t lead you to attract your future prospects and drive conversion. Therefore, in this chapter, we have shared how you can create a well-designed email to grow your business using beautiful email templates without coding. Have a look! Chapter 3

4 – How to measure the effectiveness of your email campaign?

Email effectiveness is a broad phase for marketers as well as businessmen. Though Email campaign success doesn’t include creating and shooting emails to your clients. Read to know how you can measure the success of your email marketing campaign. Chapter 4

5 – How To Use A/B Tests To Improve Your Email Campaigns?

Email campaigns and newsletters are an extraordinary but effective method to retreat your business that adds more clients. It has become very important to understand what is required to make your email marketing a success. In this chapter, we have shared what is A/B testing and how it can help you to create new effective marketing strategy as well as retain your customers as well. Have a  look! Chapter 5

6- How to generate leads with your email marketing campaign?

Email campaigns and newsletters are an extraordinary but effective method to retreat your business that adds more clients. In this chapter, you will be learning how to generate leads through email marketing campaign, what kind of email marketing strategy should be followed and what are the best practices to generate leads. Have a look! Chapter 6

7- How to increase the conversion rates of your email marketing campaign?

Email Marketing is an art to create a compelling and eye-catching marketing strategy. However, if it’s designed in a right way, it can turn into the sale or the trash-can. In this chapter, you will learn how to increase the conversion rates of email marketing campaign. Have a look! Chapter 7

8 – List of email marketing tools to optimize your email marketing campaigns

A campaign is nothing if it’s not designed with the help of the right email marketing tool. The tools you choose for your marketing strategy must fulfill all your marketing requirements. Therefore, we have pinned down the list of mostly used email marketing tools to optimize your email marketing campaigns. Have a look! Chapter 8

9 – How to get started with email marketing automation?

Email marketing automation is the ability to send or reply triggered emails to subscribers with relevant information as per your email campaign. This kind of technology helps to nurture more leads and add a personal touch by sending birthday greetings on time, or automated blog updates etc. In this chapter, we have shared how to get started with email marketing automation. Have a look! Chapter 9

10- How To Optimize Your Emails For Mobile Devices?

People love to spend their most of time on mobiles. Whether its blackberry, iPhone, Android or tablet, the use of mobile is increasing day by day. Mobile email strategy is more than an email strategy. It covers an email marketing strategy that will make use of smartphones in the pocket of their potential customers. Therefore in this chapter, we have shared how to optimize your emails for mobile devices? Have a look! Chapter 10

11- Email Marketing Terms Every Marketer Should Know

In the chapter, we have a shared list of email marketing jargons from A to Z that every marketer, as well as the businessman, should know. These are the email marketing terms and definitions that will keep you updated and understand the marketing language while creating online email campaigns. Have a look! Chapter 11

12- Most Frequently Email Marketing Questions Asked By Marketers

In the 12th chapter of our free email marketing course, we have shared the common set of email marketing questions asked by the marketers. These questions can be your doubts or questions asked during your interview to test your knowledge. Have a look! Chapter 12 Let us know in the comment section if you have any query or want us to write about any particular subject. We would be happy to help.
